item.title: My 'select an option' NpcDialogue on Delta
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

It’s in parseIncomingPackets, as it uses a switch statement, you should just search for ‘case 185:’

item.title: My 'select an option' NpcDialogue on Delta
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The 9191-9194 case’s belong in packet 185 if you didn’t include them there, if not, then you have the in-correct action buttons.

Read full topic
item.source: My 'select an option' NpcDialogue on Delta

item.title: My 'select an option' NpcDialogue on Delta
item.dc:creator: @davedave davedave
item.description:
@davedave wrote:

Well, this is what I’ve done.

if (NPCID == 2253) { sendFrame164(2492); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2493); sendFrame126("", 2494); sendFrame126("", 2495); sendFrame126("If this works it'll be awesome", 2496); sendFrame126("Click one of us! NOW!!", 2497); sendFrame126("No, wait, dont.", 2498); }

Also,

[code]case 9191:
toX = 1561;
toY = 1561;
RemoveAllWindows();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;

	case 9192:
		toX = 1561;   
		toY = 1561;   
		heightLevel = 0;
		RemoveAllWindows();
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		break;

	case 9193: 
		toX = 1561;      
		toY = 1561;      
		heightLevel = 0;
		RemoveAllWindows();
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;      
		break;

	case 9194:
		toX = 1561;      
		toY = 1561;
		RemoveAllWindows();
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;      
		break;[/code]

But nothing happens when I try to teleport with the dialogue?

Read full topic
